‚òï Lesson 1: What is Java?

‚è±Ô∏è Estimated time: 15 minutes | Difficulty: Beginner

Write Once, Run Anywhere

Java is a high-level, class-based, object-oriented programming language designed to have as few implementation dependencies as possible. It is famous for its "Write Once, Run Anywhere" (WORA) philosophy.

Java is Everywhere

Java is one of the most popular programming languages in the world. It runs on billions of devices ‚Äî from Android phones to enterprise servers to IoT devices. Its motto: "Write Once, Run Anywhere!"

Why Learn Java?

  • üè¢ Enterprise ‚Äî Most large companies use Java backend systems
  • üì± Android ‚Äî Primary language for Android app development
  • üîí Type Safety ‚Äî Catches errors before running
  • üåê Cross-Platform ‚Äî JVM runs on any operating system
  • üíº Jobs ‚Äî One of the most in-demand programming skills

How Java Works

Java code is compiled to bytecode, which runs on the Java Virtual Machine (JVM). This is why Java works on any platform!

Your Code (.java) ‚Üí Compile ‚Üí Bytecode (.class) ‚Üí JVM ‚Üí Runs Anywhere!

Java vs Other Languages

Feature Java Python C++
Typing Static Dynamic Static
Speed Fast Slower Fastest
Memory Managed (GC) Managed Manual
OOP Required Optional Optional
